title: Pogačar, Evenepoel Lick Wounds after Amstel Gold Race Upset: ‘The Finish Was 5 Meters Too Late’
content:
Evenepoel pins lost chance of Amstel victory on mid-race fall: ‘I had to push 100 watts more to come back’

Read the full article at Pogačar, Evenepoel Lick Wounds after Amstel Gold Race Upset: ‘The Finish Was 5 Meters Too Late’ on Velo.
author: sstokes
